GuideCard-1.subHeadText: Upload your inventory through manual or automatic means

GuideCard-2.subHeadText: Tell buyers who you are by providing practical information about your business

GuideCard-3.subHeadText: Read through the Requests For Proposals that buyers have posted while searching for their needs
GuideCard-3.disabledInfoText: only available once you complete the other 2 steps

ImageUploadContainer.helpText: A JPG or PNG image must not be more than 4,000 pixels wide high, and its file size must be less than 5MB.

options.seller: I want to SELL RE Products

SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.facilityStoryHelpText: Some users want to quickly read the story of your facility without having to parse all the numeric information. This is different than the impact story. See an example of a facility story
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.facilityStoryPlaceholderText: Pitch the brands that you've sold to or are affiliated with. Let the Buyers know how you've helped lessen the pollution and made an impact in the environment. Narrate your social contributions as well as your impact to the grassroot community of your Facility. Share your story to make a difference!
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.greenLabelsHelperText1: TIP: 90% of buyers are looking for products that have green labels. Labels represent a choosing shortcut for them.
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.greenLabelsHelperText2: You will have to provide document proofs about each label or it wonâ€™t be displayed in the product page.
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.impactStoryHelpText: Help your users by giving a brief description of the additional impact that you can provide. See an example of an impact story.
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.impactStoryRememberText: Remember: you should upload document proofs of your sustainability claims
SellerAddFacilitiesSustainabilityForm.impactStoryPlaceholderText: Briefly describe facility and its story

SellerAddFacilitiesImagesForm.youCanAddImagesLater: You can add images later. 75% of buyers think images are important to give credibility and transparency to your facility, products and services
